attributes.action: Removal of the law which states Religious Ministers are except from sexual discrimination
attributes.additional_details:
After the vote by the Church of England to not allow women bishops, the law which states religious ministers can not sexually discriminate in the work place should be removed.

These people are in paid work, just like a politician or an plumber, and should not be exempt from these rules of the country and of human rights.

We should not be afraid to challenge religious groups who are behind the times just because it may "cause offence", and action must be taken.
